name: Workspace (Christopher Bukal Chilicuisa)
description:
It's your turn to hand in the monthly complaints to the company CEO. Naturally, to ensure no one is pressured to keep their grievances unvoiced, this process is as painless as possible.

Controls: arrow keys to move; space to jump; ctrl to dodge-roll; c to zap

Programming, Design, Art, Animation by Christopher Bukal Chilicuisa.

Music: Elevator Music, Looking Glass

Supervised by Florian Berger.

Advisors: Florian Berger, Nikolas Joshua Klein

Version 0.8 - game is functional but without any audio

Version 1.0 - game has audio implemented

This game was created as the final Bachelor project at Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. Winter Semester (2021/2022)
